Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: aqua/water/eau, lactobacillus/portulaca oleracea ferment extract, hexylene glycol, capryloyl glycine, panthenol, sodium hyaluronate, magnesium carboxymethyl beta-glucan, biosaccharide gum-1, leuconostoc/radish root ferment fil

ish root ferment filtrate, xylitylglucoside, phenoxyethanol, ethylhexylglycerin, citric acid, pantolactone, glutathione.

Directions: After cleansing, pour the BALANCING TONER onto a cotton wool pad and gently wipe it over your face, neck and d collet .

; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
